title: Remove account setup functionality

requirements.text: Remove the SignupModal component file at frontend/src/components/auth/SignupModal.tsx
acceptanceCriteria: SignupModal.tsx file is deleted from the frontend codebase
No references to SignupModal remain in any frontend component

requirements.text: Remove signup storage utilities from frontend/src/utils/signupStorage.ts
acceptanceCriteria: signupStorage.ts file is deleted or emptied
No signup data is persisted to localStorage or sessionStorage

requirements.text: Remove password hashing utilities from frontend/src/utils/passwordHash.ts
acceptanceCriteria: passwordHash.ts file is deleted or emptied
No password hashing logic remains in the frontend

requirements.text: Remove UserProfile type and all user registration/authentication methods from backend/main.mo
acceptanceCriteria: UserProfile type definition is removed from main.mo
All user registration functions are removed from the backend actor
All password authentication methods are removed from the backend actor
User profile storage (Maps/Lists) is removed from backend state

requirements.text: Remove UserProfile and related authentication types from backend/migration.mo
acceptanceCriteria: UserProfile type is removed from OldActor and NewActor definitions
User registration request types are removed from migration module
Migration logic does not reference user profiles or authentication data

constraints: Do not remove Internet Identity authentication (LoginButton component must remain functional)
Keep the single-actor backend architecture intact
nonGoals: Changing the core application structure or other features
